instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332 no power
820-3332 no power
threads.message:
Do you get 3V3_S5/SUS?
Are you using original 85W Magsafe charger?
Post PM_BATLOW_L.

threads.title: 820-3332 no power
threads.message:
PP3V3_SUS 3.34v
PP3V3_S5 3.33V
"Are you using original 85W Magsafe charger? '' yes, original.
PM_BATLOW_L  3.30v.


Mac accepts PRAM reset, but has no image, cooler rotates normally.

threads.title: 820-3332 no power
threads.message:
Is it the classic GPU fault?

Mac reads the external SSD.

threads.title: 820-3332 no power
threads.message:
Looks like you have dificulties to explain the symptomps of your boards.
You tittled "no power" and said  missing 5V_S0.
Now the fan spins, machine is on, has even USB activity.
How can we help, if you do not provide accurate information???

Hardware mode to disable GPU on this board, has already been posted on the forum.
Just in case, resolder U8900 first...
